Widget.name: Language Selector
Widget.Description: Provides the user with the possibility of switching the application language.

Option.name: Languages
Option.Description: List of available languages for the Mashup UI.

Option.name: Visible options count
Option.Description: Specifies the number of options visible at a time when the select field is opened.

Option.name: Select size
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the select field. You must enter an integer.
